pr_title: Export slim query info to file upon PoS query completion

timeline.message:
Export slim query info to file upon PoS query completion

Presto-on-Spark supports exporting JSON serialized QueryInfo since
670ecb5dd26da8ecbe0233c6c60502e5c93cf2d5. In practice, we found full
QueryInfo can frequently be too verbose (e.g. >16MB). Thus we export a
slim version instead.

Export slim query info to file upon PoS query completion

timeline.author: arhimondr

timeline.bodyText: optional: Maybe try to move the ExecutionFailureInfo  to presto-comon, not sure if it is fine to include presto-main in verifier.
timeline.author: arhimondr

replies.bodyText:
@arhimondr : Verifier already depends on presto-main:

  
    
      presto/presto-verifier/pom.xml
    
    
        Lines 53 to 56
      in
      740e18c
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <dependency> 
        

        
          
               <groupId>com.facebook.presto</groupId> 
        

        
          
               <artifactId>presto-main</artifactId> 
        

        
          
           </dependency> 
        
    
  


Although I think it's generally a good idea to refactor common piece in different QueryInfo/QueryStats/... into presto-common (we already have too many different type of QueryInfo/Stats in many places. But this seems to beyond the scope of this PR 😃
replies.author: wenleix
